channel.title: CVE Feed for Horner Automation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Horner Automation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0623|2024-08-02T05:17:50.182Z -- horner%20automation -- cscape%20envision%20rv
item.description: Cscape Envision RV version 4.60 is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write vulnerability when parsing project (i.e. HMI) files. The product lacks proper validation of user-supplied data, which could result in writes past the end of allocated data structures. An attacker could leverage these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-0622|2024-08-02T05:17:50.277Z -- horner%20automation -- cscape%20envision%20rv
item.description: Cscape Envision RV version 4.60 is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds write vulnerability when parsing project (i.e. HMI) files. The product lacks proper validation of user-supplied data, which could result in writes past the end of allocated data structures. An attacker could leverage these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-27916|2024-08-02T12:23:30.579Z -- horner%20automation -- cscape
item.description: The affected application lacks proper validation of user-supplied data when parsing font files (e.g., FNT). This could lead to an out-of-bounds read. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to potentially execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-7206|2024-08-02T08:57:35.091Z -- horner%20automation -- cscape
item.description: In Horner Automation Cscape versions 9.90 SP10 and prior, local attackers are able to exploit this vulnerability if a user opens a malicious CSP file, which would result in execution of arbitrary code on affected installations of Cscape.

item.title: CVE-2023-0621|2024-08-02T05:17:50.240Z -- horner%20automation -- cscape%20envision%20rv
item.description: Cscape Envision RV version 4.60 is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds read vulnerability when parsing project (i.e. HMI) files. The product lacks proper validation of user-supplied data, which could result in reads past the end of allocated data structures. An attacker could leverage these vulnerabilities to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-28653|2024-08-02T13:43:23.582Z -- horner%20automation -- cscape
item.description: The affected application lacks proper validation of user-supplied data when parsing project files (e.g., CSP). This could lead to a use-after-free vulnerability. An attacker could leverage this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code in the context of the current process.
